channel.title: PhoneSpec Pro â€“ Latest Tech & Smartphone News
channel.description: Daily smartphone, tech leaks, reviews, and breaking news updates.

item.title: Apple Rumoured to Be Developing Next-Gen AirTag and Upgraded HomePod mini Accessories
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: Leaked iOS 26 code reveals Apple's plans for AirTag 2 with advanced tracking and a refreshed HomePod mini with S10 chip for 2026.

item.title: Honor X8d Officially Revealed With Huge 7,000 mAh Battery and 4G-Only Chipset
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: Honor X8d appears online with a gigantic 7,000 mAh battery, 108MP camera, and Snapdragon 6s 4G Gen 2 chipset.

item.title: Nothing Phone (4a) and (4a) Pro Specs Leak Along With Rumoured Nothing Headphone (a)
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: Specs & pricing for Nothing Phone (4a) and (4a) Pro leak, featuring Snapdragon 7s/7 Gen 4 and a budget Nothing Headphone (a).

item.title: Samsung Reportedly Exploring Global-Shutter Image Sensor Tech for Future Galaxy Flagships
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: Samsung may be developing a hybrid 12MP sensor with global-shutter-level performance to eliminate motion distortion.

item.title: DJI Neo 2 Drone Gets Apple Watch Control Support, Adding Wrist-Based Convenience
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: New firmware update brings full Apple Watch control to the DJI Neo 2, enabling steering and recording from the wrist.

item.title: Moto G (2026) Now Available in the US and Canada
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: The 2026 Moto G launches in North America with Android 16, a 120Hz display, and Pantone color options.

item.title: OpenAI Unveils ChatGPT-5.2 With Smarter Long-Context Reasoning, Better Tool Support and Productivity Boosts
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: OpenAI launches GPT-5.2, a reasoning-focused upgrade delivering major improvements in coding, document analysis & workflows.

item.title: ChatGPT Gets Adobe Boost: Photoshop, Acrobat and Express Now Work Inside the Chat Interface
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: Adobe integrates Photoshop, Acrobat & Express directly into ChatGPT for easy photo editing, design, and PDF management.

item.title: NVIDIA Marks Cyberpunk 2077's 5th Anniversary With Ultra-Rare RTX 2080 Ti Giveaway Signed by CEO
item.dc:creator: shedrack
item.description: NVIDIA celebrates Cyberpunk 2077's anniversary with a custom RTX 2080 Ti GPU signed by Jensen Huang.
